change.changenote: Section 20 (a) BEFORE amended by 2023-10-276, effective March 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: a person must not hold himself or herself out as being certified unless the person is certified in accordance with the regulations, and

change.changenote: Section 32 (6) BEFORE amended by 2023-10-277, effective March 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: If a person is unable or unavailable to reconsider an order he or she made, a person the minister designates may act under this section in respect of the order as if the designated person had made the order.

change.changenote: Section 60 (1) (f) (iii) BEFORE amended by 2017-10-14, effective November 2, 2017 (Royal Assent).

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: the class or size of facilities used for the purpose of doing the activity to which the license will apply;
